column2:
com %>% 
  filter(project_status %in% c("Completed", "Ongoing")) %>% 
  mutate(site = case_when(!is.na(admin5pcode) ~ admin5pcode, 
                          !is.na(camp_name) ~ camp_name, 
                          TRUE ~ admin4pcode)) %>% 
  group_by(site) %>% 
  slice(which.max(beneficiaries)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  {sum(.$beneficiaries)} %>% 
  format(big.mark = ",")
